name: Minesweep
body:
## What's Minesweep?
This is a simple JavaScript Minesweeper Game. The objective is to move around the board by clicking on each box without hitting 3 or more mines. The more non-mines you find, the more your score will be.

It's survival in that 5*5 area! 
 
No messing around or you die!  

Play demo at [HERE](http://www.davidn.byethost7.com/index.html)  

### Future Plans
* *Improve the mine placement algorithm.
* *Add login with social network
* *Better the UI
* *Increase the board size for more fun!
* *Show ranking of players with highest score
* *Add cool music and sound when you get blown up by mines! 

### Support or Contact
Having trouble with the game? It's survival. It's better if you die always!
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
